title: The Ghastling: Book Twelve
description: The Ghastling’s ‘Strange Signs // Ritual Protection Marks’ issue features eight timely stories suffused with signs, symbols, talismans, totems and macabre folkloric traditions.Includes stories from Lucy Ashe, Barry Charman, Victoria Day, K. M. Hazel, Tom Johnstone, Kristy Kerruish, Bess Lovejoy and Damien B. Raphael.
author: Rebecca Parfitt
